content: {A开心}I loooove it! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the home you picked for me is just perfect. According to the Isaki family rules, I'm supposed to offer a token of thanks. Could you tell me what kind of <style=Highlight>shoes</style> you like?

content: I... Understood! Then, please accept this specially selected present, mm!
